code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Tree Detection"
        PLR[Infra_WorkerNode] --> SCAN[Infra_WorkerNode]
        SCAN --> LOGS[Infra_WorkerNode]
        LOGS --> CLUSTER[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        CLUSTER --> BASE[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        BASE --> CHECK{Infra_RedisCache}
        CHECK -->|No| ADD[Infra_EtcdCluster]
        CHECK -->|Yes| SKIP[Infra_RedisCache]
        ADD --> TREES[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    end
    
    subgraph "Tree Cutting Process"
        REQ[Infra_IngressController] --> LLM[Infra_WorkerNode]
        LLM --> COORD[Infra_IngressController]
        COORD --> MOVE[Infra_WorkerNode]
        MOVE --> START[Infra_RedisCache]
        
        START --> HEIGHT[Infra_EtcdCluster]
        HEIGHT --> FINDLOGS[Infra_RedisCache]
        FINDLOGS --> HASLOG{Infra_EtcdCluster}
        
        HASLOG -->|Yes| CUT[Infra_EtcdCluster]
        HASLOG -->|No| NEXTH[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        
        CUT --> EFFECTS[Infra_WorkerNode]
        EFFECTS --> WOOD[Infra_RedisCache]
        WOOD --> MORE{Infra_WorkerNode}
        
        MORE -->|Yes| HEIGHT
        MORE -->|No| NEXTH
        
        NEXTH --> MAXH{Infra_IngressController}
        MAXH -->|No| HEIGHT
        MAXH -->|Yes| DONE[Infra_IngressController]
        
        DONE --> MARK[Infra_IngressController]
        MARK --> COMPLETE[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    
    subgraph "Cut Tree Registry"
        MARK --> REGISTRY[Infra_IngressController]
        REGISTRY --> KEY[Infra_RedisCache]
        KEY --> PERSIST[Infra_RedisCache]
        PERSIST --> PREVENT[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    
    style SCAN fill:#e8f5e8
    style CUT fill:#ffebee
    style EFFECTS fill:#fff3e0
    style REGISTRY fill:#f3e5f5
repo_description: Intelligent Agentic NPCs for Minecraft with LLM Integration
